LanguageData.Cults_Disillusioned.label: disillusionment
LanguageData.Cults_Disillusioned.recoveryMessage: {0} has recovered from their struggle with their inner faith.
LanguageData.Cults_Disillusioned.beginLetter: Either the truth is too horrible for {0}, or [PAWN_pronoun] is becoming empowered with a sudden realization. Even so, [PAWN_pronoun] has started to abandon any strange or occult ideas.
LanguageData.Cults_DeepSleepCarcosa.label: deep sleep
LanguageData.Cults_DeepSleepCarcosa.beginLetter: {0} is visiting the lost city of Carcosa in [PAWN_possessive] dreams.
